name: NEBUXEL - DECENTRALIZED
description:
“Decentralized” is the second-to-last of the Nebuxel series.

The subject represents the concept of decentralization: a concept bound to become the solid foundation on which to build a society 3.0. 

What will society 3.0 look like? Will we be making a better and wiser usage of technology? One thing is for sure. Once we get there, we will embrace the shift from a centralized understanding of the world, to a decentralized one. A whole new perspective that will respect the ecology of everything, both natural and artificial.

The subject, fully rotating at 360 degrees embodies this upcoming view upon the world, taking shape as an exemplary individual within Society 3.0. Here, as a matter of fact, every single individual will become a “nation”, granted equity in the access and management of personal information, with a layer of reciprocal protection.

#NEBUXEL006
